actions.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 238 (Roll no. 602).
Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. King (IA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 238 (Roll no. 602).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. King (IA) to the Rules amendment (A001).

amends_amendment.description: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.
amends_amendment.purpose: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.

description: An amendment No. 12 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to require that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement, administer, or enforce the prevailing rate wage requirements of the Davis-Bacon Act.
purpose: An amendment No. 12 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to require that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement, administer, or enforce the prevailing rate wage requirements of the Davis-Bacon Act.
